display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
路由管理
React Router v7
config/routes.ts
动态生成与权限过滤

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
布局层
ProLayout
ProTabs (多标签页 + 持久化)
KeepAlive (CSS显隐 + React 19 Offscreen + useTransition)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
视图层
pages/ 业务页面
components/ (120+ 组件 + Ant Design v6)
按钮/菜单使用 usePermission 判断可见性

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
状态管理
Zustand (store/ 多 slices)
- userStore (用户信息/登录)
- permissionStore (权限列表/缓存)
- themeStore (明暗模式)
- tabsStore (标签页状态)
actions & reducers 为历史遗留

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 服务层\nservice/ 统一请求封装\n并发/重试/取消/错误处理/消息去重

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Mock 数据\nmock/ + Faker + MSW\n支持多角色权限模拟

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
权限引擎 RBAC
config/permissions.ts
路由/菜单/按钮三级控制
useSafeNavigate 防越权

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 主题切换\ntheme/ + themeStore\n明暗模式自动适配

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 国际化\ni18n/ + 多语言文件\n动态切换

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 自定义 Hooks\nhooks/\nusePermission / useRequest / useAuth / useKeepAlive 等

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 工具函数\nutils/ (权限判断/格式化等)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
AI 集成
ChatGPT (流式对话)
Markmap (思维导图)
Mermaid (图表渲染)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 全局配置\nconfig/ + types/\n路由/权限/环境配置

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
